select DISTINCT w.id as id, w.create_id as createId, w.create_name as createName, w.create_time as createTime, w.file_url as fileUrl, w.works_desc as worksDesc, w.works_name as worksName, (select sum(s.score) from t_score s where s.works_id = w.id)as score, w.batch as batch, w.status as status, w.type as `type` from t_works w left join t_user u on w.create_id = u.id left join t_score s on s.works_id = w.id
and w.works_name like "%${worksName}%"
and w.create_name like "%${createName}%"
order by w.create_time desc
SELECT count(*) as value,`type` as type FROM `t_works` group by type
select file_url from t_works order by create_time limit 5

select DISTINCT w.id as id, w.create_id as createId, w.create_name as createName, w.create_time as createTime, w.file_url as fileUrl, w.works_desc as worksDesc, w.works_name as worksName, (select sum(s.score) from t_score s where s.works_id = w.id)as score, w.batch as batch, w.status as status from t_works w left join t_user u on w.create_id = u.id left join t_score s on s.works_id = w.id where score is not null and w.status =1 order by score desc limit 3

select DISTINCT w.id as id, w.create_id as createId, w.create_name as createName, w.create_time as createTime, w.file_url as fileUrl, w.works_desc as worksDesc, w.works_name as worksName, (select sum(s.score) from t_score s where s.works_id = w.id)as score, w.batch as batch, w.status as status, w.type as `type` from t_works w left join t_user u on w.create_id = u.id left join t_score s on s.works_id = w.id and w.create_id = #{createId} order by w.create_time desc
